chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION;
chapter.para: In many places there is need for asynchronous I/O operations, be it file, socket or any other. There are asynchronous I/O libraries. However implementations are thread safe and restricted to some specific assumptions.
&THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; fills this gap. It aims to provide simple API which enables user to abstract I/O operation in any way he desires.
